oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Assessment of an oxfendazole pulsed release bolus for control of parasitic gastroenteritis in calves in a rotational grazing system
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mitchell, G. B. B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: lungworm
grazing system
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A group of 71 Friesian bullocks, aged six to nine months, vaccinated against lungworm, were randomly allocated on a liveweight basis to two groups of 40 and 31 animals. Full article published in Veterinary Record (1987) 121, 377-378.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1987; 127
